Text: Thanks!!! This is THE best torrent on the bay!!! Its huge but its got every book in PDF & epub & audio book from the 9th to 11th doctor. Unbelievable. I've got some of em, but i can't even hope to acquire all these. MUCH appreciated!!!
Can't beleive its not top of the pops on pirate bay but maybe cos its so big.

I could get you a torrent of the Terraphiles book, but it's not scanned very well and is a collection of JPGs for each page. 

Would that be any use? 

Could you convert the pages using OCR to text, and then PDF or something?

I have no clue how to do that stuff myself.
